name: id
description: HTML Id of a module's page

name: label
description: Module page label used by the Menu(s) & the Tracker

name: url
description: Module's page link ( should always start with "#/" )

name: scripts
description: The location of the javascript files this page requires, each entry refers to one file

name: tplPath
description: The location of the module's page default html directive

name: checkPermission
description: This object contains the module's page permission, the user's ACL is matched against this entry to determine if the page is accessiblew

name: icon
description: An optional icon that shows up in the menu(s), given to the default page of the module.

name: tracker
description: If set to true, then breadcrumbs are enabled and displayed above the module

name: ancestor
description: If tracker is set to true, displays the list of parent breadcrumbs based on this array, up to the module's page

name: mainMenu
description: If set to true, the module has an entry in the main menu

name: footerMenu
description: If set tot true, the module has an entry in the footer menu

name: userMenu
description: If set tot true, the module has an entry in the user menu (this menu shows up for logged in members only)

name: guestMenu
description: If set tot true, the module has an entry in the guest menu (this menu shows up for non logged in members only)
